mainImage.title: Ringing the changes: inside the Lloyd's of London building
mainImage.description: Lloyds London Insurance City tradition ...Lloyds of London for the big page. Underwriters and brokers cut deals on the trading floor at Lloyds where face to face negotiations still rule.
